response.overview: Alex Velluto is a stand-up comedian and Diet Coke drinker from Salt Lake City, Utah. He has performed at comedy festivals all over the country including the Boston Comedy Festival, Big Sky Comedy Festival, and the Seattle International Comedy Competition. He was named “Best of Fest” at the Golden Spike Comedy Festival and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY.  In 2016, Alex was voted “Best Comedian” by City Weekly Magazine. His debut comedy special “Alex Velluto: Spurious” is currently streaming on Amazon.com.
response.title: Alex Velluto: Thirsty
